sentences.en: a legal adviser
sentences.cn: 法律顾问

sentences.en: a pressure group that is campaigning to make cannabis legal
sentences.cn: 争取大麻合法化的压力团体

sentences.en: Always seek professional legal advice before entering into any agreement.
sentences.cn: 在签订任何协定之前一定要先征求法律专业人士的意见。

sentences.en: Banning cigarette advertising would be unconstitutional, since selling cigarettes is legal.
sentences.cn: 既然出售香烟是合法的，那么禁止做香烟广告就是违宪的。

sentences.en: But legal experts are not sure if such a charge can stick.
sentences.cn: 但法律专家们不能肯定这一指控是否成立。

sentences.en: He had twice the legal limit of alcohol in his bloodstream.
sentences.cn: 他血液中的酒精含量是法定限度的两倍。

sentences.en: He was involved in a legal wrangle with the Health Secretary.
sentences.cn: 他卷入了与卫生大臣的法律纠纷之中。

sentences.en: In the end, his brilliant legal footwork paid off.
sentences.cn: 最后，他高明的法律手腕使他如愿以偿。

sentences.en: Legal Aid can often provide referral to other types of agencies.
sentences.cn: 法律援助机构通常可以帮助引荐到其他类型的机构去。

sentences.en: Martin was thinking of taking legal action against Zuckerman.
sentences.cn: 马丁在考虑对朱克曼提起诉讼。

sentences.en: One possible solution, if all else fails, is to take legal action.
sentences.cn: 如果其他办法都不行，还有一种可能是提起诉讼。

sentences.en: Our legal system inherited laws from the English system.
sentences.cn: 我们的司法体系沿袭了英国的法律体系。

sentences.en: plans to make the carrying of identity cards a legal requirement
sentences.cn: 使携带身份证成为法定要求的计划

sentences.en: She refused to promote Colin above the low rank of "legal adviser".
sentences.cn: 她拒绝把科林由“法律顾问”这一低级别往上提。

sentences.en: She was the only woman in Shell's legal department.
sentences.cn: 她是壳牌公司法律事务部唯一的女性。

sentences.en: The legal definition of "know" often presumes mental control.
sentences.cn: “知晓”的法律定义通常假定存在思维控制能力。

sentences.en: The legal profession is starting to be less elitist and more representative.
sentences.cn: 法律行业正开始变得更具平民性，不像从前那么精英化。

sentences.en: The tobacco industry escaped unscathed from its toughest legal challenge.
sentences.cn: 烟草业成功逃过了最严峻的法律质疑。

sentences.en: We shall offer you assistance with legal expenses up to $5,000.
sentences.cn: 我们将为您提供最高5,000美元的法律援助金。

sentences.en: What the company has done is perfectly legal.
sentences.cn: 公司所做的这一切完全合法。
